meanings.definition: To make someone or something neat, stylish, or attractive.
meanings.sent1: She spiffied up her room before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent2: The tailor spiffied up the suit for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The magician spiffied up his hat with glitter for the show.
meanings.sent4: The artist spiffied up the painting with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The gardener spiffied up the garden with fresh flowers and decorations.

meanings.definition: To improve the appearance or condition of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He spiffied his resume before sending it out for job applications.
meanings.sent2: The chef spiffied up the dish with a garnish before serving it.
meanings.sent3: The mechanic spiffied up the car engine to make it run smoothly.
meanings.sent4: The teacher spiffied up the lesson plan with interactive activities.
meanings.sent5: The designer spiffied up the website with a new layout and graphics.
